name: Madrox, the Multiple Man Quiz | Marvel Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: In which comic book was Madrox first introduced?
questions.explanation:
Fantastic Four.

	The Fantastic Four battled an insane and lonely Madrox who had come to New York City to find someone to repair his malfunctioning containment suit. With the help of Professor Charles Xavier, Madrox was returned to his normal self and even outgrew the need for his suit.

questions.text: Madrox has displayed his powers from the day he was born.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Mutants normally manifest their powers in their teenage years, which sets Madrox apart. There is some speculation as to whether or not he is actually a mutant at all.

questions.text: How old was Madrox when his parents were killed?
questions.explanation:
15.

	Madrox and his parents lived in Kansas, where Madrox could be raised in peace and exile. His father, a scientist, developed a suit that Madrox could wear to curtail his powers.

questions.text: Madrox was invited to join the X-Men after they defeated which mutant?
questions.explanation:
Proteus.

	Madrox refused, deciding to live on Muir Island and help Doctor Moira MacTaggert with her work. After Muir Island was destroyed during a battle with the Shadow King, Madrox joined X-Factor.

questions.text: Madrox has complete control of his duplicates.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Madrox's duplicates have displayed some level of self-sufficiency. One duplicate wanted to replace the original Madrox, while another died of the Legacy Virus. It's not a sure bet that his duplicates will be law-abiding or mentally stable.

questions.text: Where is Madrox's detective agency based?
questions.explanation:
New York City.

	X-Factor Investigations is set up in the "Mutant Town" area of New York City, home also to a depowered Quicksilver. Other members of X-Factor Investigations include Strong Guy and Siryn.

False.

	Madrox learned about this when one duplicate was shot dead in an ambush. This made Madrox question his powers. Did he have any right to put them in danger?

questions.text: Which blue-skinned mutant was Madrox sent to investigate along with Quicksilver?
questions.explanation:
Rhapsody.

	Rhapsody had a poorly defined power, the ability to make strange things occur while playing music. She accidentally killed a member of the school board by making him feel far too much ecstasy.

questions.text: With which other member of X-Factor did Madrox constantly joke around with?
questions.explanation:
Strong Guy.

	Strong Guy is a mutant who can increase his strength untold times! Abuse of this power led to a deformed body. He's in constant pain, but hides by making jokes.

questions.text: How many duplicates can Madrox create?
questions.explanation:
40.

	When X-Factor was officially announced as a team, an insane duplicate fought Madrox and, as the two punched each other, more duplicates were created and engaged in the fight. Once 40 was reached, no more duplicates appeared, although the punching continued.
